company_info: A specialized recruitment firm with 27 years of track records recruiting in the Construction, Oil & Gas, and Pharma industries. description:
Roles & Responsibilities
About our client: Our client is a leading global multidisciplinary engineering consultancy.

About the role:
· Technical engineering of Electrical systems, including.
o Lead discipline on projects
o Developing and guiding junior engineers
o Applying policies relating to health & safety, quality, and training
· To act as a discipline lead on projects to successfully deliver high-quality discipline projects in accordance with corporate and client requirements.
· Capability of leading MEP for small to medium-sized projects.
· Develop a thorough design philosophy, effectively contributing to the inception, development, and detailed delivery of projects across all stages.
· Responsible for the correctness, accuracy, and complete multi-disciplinary coordination of the design documentation in accordance with QA/QC review processes
· Attend external meetings and prepare design presentations and design reports
· Coordinate and liaise with all other design team members, including architects and structural engineers plus clients, project managers, and QS.
· Have a good knowledge of sustainable design, buildability & construction techniques.
· Demonstrated critical thinking skills, and ability to work methodically and analytically in a quantitative problem-solving environment.
· Strong attention to detail, team work, collaboration, organization, and problem-solving skills.
· Understanding of the financial and commercial management of projects.
· Provide technical support to respond to prequalification documents, RFPs, and other client inquiries
· Excellent written and verbal communication skills
Ensure that Health & Safety is embedded into all work practices in line with company policies

About you:
· Bachelor's or Master’s Degree in Building Services / Electrical Engineering that is recognized by the Singapore Professional Engineer (PE) Board.
· Working towards professional engineer registration and/or charters.
· PE Registration is desirable but not essential
· Minimum of 7 years’ experience, 4 years’ experience in Highrise buildings is preferable.
· Proven track record in building services design with different types of sectors, including high rise, commercial, residential, retail, Healthcare, Industrial, refurbishment, etc;
· Experience working on middle east projects will be an added advantage.

· Experienced in:
o Presenting to clients/authorities
o Attending authority/client meetings
o Preparing project proposals for agreement
o Arranging project resources
o Planning and running projects
· Proven ability to carry out both manual and computer-aided calculations, problem-solving, technical analyses, etc.
· Detailed knowledge of BIM/digitalization techniques and standards
· Strong software capability and proficiency in Amtech, Dialux, AutoCAD, REVIT, and Navisworks,
· Excellent knowledge of Singapore Standards and international design standards, BS-EN, CIBSE, ASHRAE, NFPA, etc
· Excellent knowledge of local statutory authorities’ regulations and submission requirements.
· Advanced knowledge of Electrical Engineering Principles, LV, Lighting, ELV, and FLS design
· Sustainable design practices and technologies
· Basic understanding of electrical and public health principles
· Maintain and participate in CPD events to develop own expertise

Personal qualities that will help you succeed in this role include:
· People Leadership
· Collaboration & Teamwork
· Commercial Acumen
· Technical Capability & Delivery
· Adaptability & Learning
· Persuading and Influencing
· Communicating and Presenting
Delivering Results

Global Vision Multimedia (GVM) is a regional most trusted end-to-end provider of multimedia delivery solutions for audiovisual, broadcast media, information technology and other related fields that utilize multimedia technologies.

Ranks 8th of 500 Top fast-growth companies in the Asia Pacific. (Source : Nikkei Asia)

We are now looking to drive rapid expansion across Asia, and looking for a highly motivated candidate to join our talented and passionate team based in Singapore.

Job Summary:

The Audio Visual Service Engineer will be responsible for providing technical support for audio visual equipment in a variety of settings, including corporate offices, educational institutions, government agencies, and public venues. The successful candidate will work with clients to troubleshoot and resolve technical issues related to audio visual equipment, including projectors, video walls, digital signage, and video conferencing systems. The role will require extensive knowledge of audio visual equipment, as well as excellent communication and customer service skills.

Key Responsibilities:
Install, configure, and troubleshoot audio visual equipment such as projectors, video walls, digital signage, and video conferencing systems.
Work with clients to diagnose and resolve technical issues related to audio visual equipment.
Provide on-site technical support for events and presentations, including set-up and breakdown of equipment.
Train clients on the proper use and maintenance of audio visual equipment.
Maintain an inventory of audio visual equipment and ensure that all equipment is in good working condition.
Perform preventive maintenance on audio visual equipment to minimize downtime and extend the life of the equipment.
Stay up-to-date on new audio visual technologies and products and recommend upgrades or improvements to existing systems.
Provide excellent customer service and maintain positive relationships with clients.
Qualifications:
Studyin electrical engineering, computer science, or a related field.
Experience in audio visual engineering or a related field.
Extensive knowledge of audio visual equipment, including projectors, video walls, digital signage, and video conferencing systems.
Experience with troubleshooting technical issues related to audio visual equipment.
Strong communication and customer service skills.
Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
Willingness to work flexible hours and be available for on-call support.
Knowledge of networking and IT infrastructure is a plus.

company_info: Global Vision Multimedia (GVM) is a regional most trusted end-to-end provider of multimedia delivery solutions for audiovisual, broadcast media, information technology and other related fields that utilize multimedia technologies. We are now looking to drive rapid expansion across Asia, and looking for a highly motivated candidate to join our talented and passionate team based in Singapore.

Job Summary:

The Audio Visual Project Engineer will be responsible for overseeing the design, installation, and maintenance of audio visual systems for various projects. The Engineer will work closely with project managers, technicians, and clients to ensure that all audio visual systems are implemented to meet project requirements and specifications. The Engineer will also be responsible for testing and troubleshooting audio visual systems, as well as providing technical support to clients as needed.
Job Duties and Responsibilities:
Collaborate with project managers to determine project requirements and specifications for audio visual systems.
Design and develop audio visual system schematics, floor plans, and wiring diagrams.
Oversee installation of audio visual systems, including equipment placement, cabling, and integration with other systems.
Ensure that all audio visual systems meet industry standards and project requirements.
Test and troubleshoot audio visual systems to identify and resolve any issues.
Provide technical support to clients, including training on system operation and maintenance.
Create and maintain project documentation, including system manuals, as-built drawings, and testing reports.
Work with technicians to schedule and perform regular system maintenance, including firmware updates, software upgrades, and hardware replacements.
Stay up-to-date with industry trends, technologies, and best practices for audio visual system design and installation.
Communicate project updates and status to project managers and clients as needed.
Qualifications:
Study in Electrical Engineering, Audio Engineering, or related field.
Experience in audio visual system design, installation, and maintenance.
Knowledge of audio visual system components, including video projectors, sound systems, video walls, and control systems.
Familiarity with audio visual system design software, such as AutoCAD or Visio.
Ability to read and interpret technical drawings and schematics.
Strong problem-solving and troubleshooting skills.
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to work effectively with clients and project teams.
Ability to work independently and manage multiple projects simultaneously.
Willingness to travel to project sites as needed.

title: Principal Mechanical Engineer (Engineering Consultancy)
company_info: A specialized recruitment firm with 27 years of track records recruiting in the Construction, Oil & Gas, and Pharma industries. We work with Fortune 500 companies and state-owned companies for Singapore & overseas hiring demands. Kingsforce Management Services Pte. Ltd. | EA Licence: 94C3545
description:
Roles & Responsibilities
About our client: Our client is a leading global multidisciplinary engineering consultancy.

About the role:
• To act as PM on selected projects by managing the successful delivery of high-quality multi and single-disciplinary projects
•Set design criteria, and check design calculations and drawings.
• Assist in preparing proposals and project invoicing.
• Assist Team Leader in internal staff management.
• Must be fully familiar with coded and Local Authority requirements.
• Project manage and supervise teams to successfully deliver high-quality discipline projects in accordance with corporate and client requirements
• Develop a thorough design philosophy, effectively contributing to the inception, development, and detailed delivery of projects across all stages
• Undertake regular reviews of all key projects within own area of responsibility and proactively engage with clients and partners to gather feedback and deliver service improvement initiatives
• Responsible for the correctness, accuracy, and complete multi-disciplinary coordination of the design documentation in accordance with QA/QC review processes
• Attend external meetings and prepare design presentations and design reports
• Input into business development activities through participation in external market profile-raising activities and functions
• Coordinate and liaise with all other design team members, including architects and structural engineers plus clients, project managers, and QS.
• Demonstrate good knowledge of sustainable design, buildability, construction techniques, procurement routes, risk assessment, and claim assessment.
• Demonstrate critical thinking skills, and ability to work methodically and analytically in a quantitative problem-solving environment.
• Exercise attention to detail, team building, collaboration, organization, and problem-solving skills.
• Demonstrate good knowledge of the financial and commercial management of projects.
• Provide technical support to respond to prequalification documents, RFPs, and other client inquiries
• Ensure that Health & Safety is embedded into all work practices in line with company policies
• Work efficiently in collaboration with remote satellite teams.

About you:
• Bachelor or master’s degree in Building Services / Mechanical Engineering that is recognized by Singapore Professional Engineer Board
• Preferably a Chartered member of an internationally recognized professional body (e.g., CIBSE, ASHRAE)
• PE Registration is desirable but not essential
• Minimum of 10-12 years experience, 6 years experience in Highrise building projects is preferable, but not essential.
• Proven track record in building services design with different types of sectors, including high-rise, commercial, residential, retail, Healthcare, Industrial, refurbishment, etc.
• Proven record as a Project Engineer on several projects.

Experienced in:
o Presenting to clients
o Attending demanding client meetings
o Preparing project proposals for agreement
o Arranging project resources
o Planning and running projects
• Proven ability to carry out both manual and computer-aided calculations, problem-solving, technical and financial analyses, etc.
• Competent use of relevant software such as MS Office Suite and electrical engineering-specific software.
• Detailed knowledge of BIM/digitalization techniques and standards
• Strong software capability and proficiency in IES, HAP, Hevacomp, AutoCAD. REVIT and Navisworks,
• Excellent knowledge of Singapore Standards and international design standards, BSEN, CIBSE, ASHRAE, NFPA etc
• Excellent knowledge of local statutory authorities’ regulations and submission requirements.
• Advanced knowledge of Mechanical Engineering Principles, HVAC, CHW, Sanitary and Plumbing and Fire Protection design
• Sustainable design practices and technologies
• Basic understanding of electrical and public health principles
• Maintain and participate in CPD events to develop own expertise

Personal qualities that will help you succeed in this role include:
• People Leadership
• Collaboration & Teamwork
• Commercial Acumen
• Technical Capability & Delivery
• Adaptability & Learning
• Persuading and Influencing
• Communicating and Presenting
• Delivering Results

*Please note that only shortlisted candidates will be contacted.

description:
Roles & Responsibilities
Senior Quality Engineer
Working Location: Boon Lay
Working Days: Monday - Friday
Working Hours: 8:30am - 5:15pm
Salary range: SGD 4,500 to SGD 5,500 monthly, 13th month, SGD 350 transport allowance

Basic Functions
Responsible to provide management and technical support to product quality. This includes review and improves work processes and systems, participate in quality audits and work with manufacturing plants on qualities and operational matters. This role also requires leading the quality engineer to achieve quality standards and objectives.

Specific Responsibilities
Implements and maintains effective quality system processes in line with ISO9001.
Develops and leads quality assurance function/team and QMS quality planning process
Ensures operational process operating and meeting process/ product requirement/ specification.
Closely monitors the performance of key quality indicators (Quality objectives) and initiates, deploys and implements plans or measures to meet the goal set.
Leads team to review, analyze daily process issues and drive respective department for process improvement.
Analyzes process weakness and/or quality performance data and work with respective department on quality improvement plan.
Ensures all documents (Quality management system, Control Plan, and inspection checklist) are updated regularly.
Participates in quality improvement programs.
Ensures that the company is readily prepared for customer audits, internal audits and/or external audits.
Qualifications / Requirements
Diploma/ Degree in Quality/Manufacturing/Mechanical/Electrical Engineering
At least 5 years’ relevant experience in a similar position
Meticulous and methodical.
Good knowledge in Autocad, SAP, ISO auditing and statistical tools e.g. minitab,
Experience working in an ISO 9001:2000 Quality System.
Strong working knowledge of MS office platforms software (Excel, Words, PowerPoint).
Proficient in the use of mechanical inspection equipment including calipers, micrometer, torque tester and other mechanical equipment.

Are you an Electrical Engineer with a passion for optimizing plant equipment maintenance? We are seeking a dynamic Plant Engineer to lead technical engineering and maintenance activities. description:
Roles & Responsibilities
Descriptions:
We are currently representing a leading hyperscale data centre operator with a strong presence in Japan, and are at the forefront of technology innovation and infrastructure excellence. We are currently seeking exceptional Electrical Engineers to join our dynamic team in Singapore, with opportunities for frequent travel to Japan.The successful candidate will play a crucial role in ensuring the reliability, performance, and sustainability of our data centre facilities in Japan.

If you are successful in this role, you will have the opportunity to work with cutting-edge technology in a rapidly growing industry. You will also receive a competitive salary and benefits package. Most importantly, you will have a chance to make a meaningful impact on the digital infrastructure that powers the world.

Key Responsibilities:
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to design, implement, and maintain electrical systems for hyper-scale data centres, ensuring they meet industry standards and best practices.
Conduct regular assessments of electrical infrastructure, identifying opportunities for optimization and efficiency improvements.
Assist in the planning and execution of electrical infrastructure upgrades and expansions.
Collaborate with vendors and contractors to ensure the highest quality of workmanship in all electrical projects.
Stay up-to-date with industry trends and emerging technologies in electrical engineering for data centres.
Act as a subject matter expert, providing guidance and mentorship to junior electrical engineers and technicians.
Key Qualifications:
Bachelor's or Master's degree in Electrical Engineering or a related field - (7-8 years exp)
Proven experience in electrical engineering design and maintenance for data centres, with a strong understanding of critical power systems, UPS, generators, and distribution systems is mandatory.
Proficiency in AutoCAD, ETAP, or similar electrical design software.
Familiarity with industry standards such as TIA-942, Uptime Institute, and NFPA.
Excellent problem-solving skills and the ability to work in high-pressure situations.
Strong communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to collaborate effectively in cross-functional teams.
Willingness to travel to Japan at least 50% of the time.
Certifications such as Professional Engineer (PE) or Certified Data Centre Professional (CDCP) are a plus.
If you believe that you fit the requirements of this opportunity and this opportunity will contribute to your career aspirations, apply now or reach out to Daniel Lim at daniel.lim@annexion-partners.com. You may also contact Daniel at +65 6632 6679.

title: Senior Robotics Engineer
company_info: At KABAM Robotics, we believe service robots will free humans to pursue greater purpose. We are driven by our passion to improve lives and empower the service workforce with technology. Through our cutting-edge connectivity technologies, and singular focus on user experience, we enable smarter and safer cities, and create a world of seamless connectivity for robots. Smart+, our proprietary robotic work management system, enables robots to communicate with each other, with building infrastructure and building management system. Our robots are equipped to carry out preemptive AI detections, and deployed as on-the-ground first responders. We have the largest commercial deployments of inspection and security robots in Singapore and are expanding to overseas markets such as Australia and Hong Kong. Our customers are predominantly in the commercial security, facility management, logistics warehouses and hospitality sectors.
description:
Roles & Responsibilities
Responsibilities:
● Design, develop and test next generation of KABAM’s Co-Lab and Halo robots by improving reliability of hardware, connectivity, sensors, perception and navigation systems
● Implement and test robotic systems and software to integrate new robot platforms or extend current supported platforms on KABAM’s Smart+ app and ensure optimal performance and reliability. Work with the front-end team to integrate your solutions into Smart+ our state of the art robot management platform and the back-end team to deploy your solutions in the cloud.
● Conduct system-level testing and validation of robotic prototypes and production models
● Liaise with commercial team to manage technical projects from scoping to deployment
● Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including mechanical engineers, electrical engineers, and software developers, to integrate hardware and software components into robotic systems, as well as with project managers and stakeholders to define project scope, milestones, and deliverables, ensuring timely and successful project completion
● Contribute to overall architecture design and documentation
● Support robot deployment at customer sites remotely around the world
● Stay up-to-date with the latest advancements in robotics and automation technologies, and evaluate their potential applications in our projects.

Requirements:
● Education – Bachelors or Masters in Computer Science/Electrical Engineering/Mechanical Engineering with a focus in robotics, mechatronics, or related fields
● Experience – Bachelors (with at least 5 years relevant experience) or Masters (with at least 2 years relevant experience)
● Industry – Previous experience in a robotics company preferred
● Supervisory – Personnel management is nice to have. Project management/technical lead experience is preferred
● Language – English (required), Mandarin (desirable)
● Computing – C++/Python, Linux, git, ROS

description:
Roles & Responsibilities
Meranti Power Pte. Ltd., a fully owned subsidiary of Energy Market Authority, is establishing a maintenance team to maintain two open cycle gas turbines of our power generation station.

We are inviting applicants for the positions of Technical Officer (Electrical) who shall report to the Senior Engineer/ Engineer/ (Electrical Maintenance) and be responsible for supporting him in the maintenance of Electrical systems of the power station/plants. The Technical Officer shall support Electrical team in the following:

Responsibilities:

Responsible for proper maintenance of gas turbine, generator and auxiliary systems as assigned by Head or Engineers in-charge
Perform troubleshooting, predictive, preventive and corrective maintenance to ensure plant equipment and systems run smoothly and efficiently
Identify, plan and initiate required actions to maintain the power plants for long term reliability and efficient generation output
Prepare technical specifications for equipment services, contract labour and ad-hoc maintenance services. Supervise and report performance of contractors to ensure good quality and progress of maintenance works, as well as full compliance with contract specifications
Liaise, supervise, and coordinate with contractors and vendors on projects, maintenance, repair, shut down, and overhaul works
Support operation and maintenance engineers in investigation, analyse and determine the root cause of plant defects and outages
Maintain and control all records as required
Assist in the preparation, certification and review of all management systems, including ISO 9001, ISO 14001, ISO 18001, ISO 50001 annually and provide support to the auditing parties wherever necessary, including internal & external auditors, to rectify non compliances and/or to follow up on improvement items identified during audit
Support engineers in managing maintenance contracts and inspections, testing and commissioning of new equipment
Monitor ad-hoc plant projects/tasks to ensure on time delivery
Perform work orders allocated by Department Heads and/or Engineers

Requirements:

Education in Electrical Engineering
Minimum 2 years’ Electrical maintenance experience in a power plant or related industry
Willing to work overtime
Self-driven with good working attitude and possess keen learning disposition
Proven attendance record and works well in a team
Work location is in Jurong Island (Transport to and from Jurong East MRT are provided)

Only shortlisted candidates will be notified.

By submitting your personal data and/or resume to Meranti Power Pte. Ltd. (“MP”), you shall be deemed to have given your consent to MP for collecting, using, and disclosing your personal data for the purpose of assessing your job application.

title: Video Codec Algorithm Engineer
company_info: Zoom Video Communications, Inc. (Zoom) is an American communications technology company headquartered in San Jose, California. It provides videotelephony and online chat services through a cloud-based peer-to-peer software platform and is used for teleconferencing, telecommuting, distance education, and social relations.[2][3] Zoom's business strategy focuses on providing an easier to use product than competitors, as well as cost savings, which include minimizing computational costs at the infrastructure level and having a high degree of employee efficiency. Zoom is an award-winning workplace. We have been recognized by Comparably as #1 CEO, Company Happiness, Benefits, Compensation, Diversity and more! Not to mention we've been awarded by Glassdoor as the 2nd Best US Workplace and Best Large Company US CEO in 2018, Wealthfront and Business Insider. Our culture focuses on delivering happiness, our commitment to transparency and the tangible benefits that we provide to our employees and our customers.
description:
Roles & Responsibilities
We are seeking a passionate Video Codec Algorithm Engineer to research and develop video compression algorithms/video encoder/decoder to improve real-time video quality and performance on Zoom video products.

Responsibilities:
Research and evaluate algorithms currently used in related applications.
Possess strong skills in the areas of development and real-time implementation of video encoder/decoder.
Participate in research and developing new video codec standard
Design and implement video compression algorithm to improve the quality
Design new algorithms to tackle new and existing problems.

Requirements:
Ph.D. or Master’s degree in Computer Science or Electrical Engineering or related field.
Prior industry experience is preferred but not required.
Proficient in C++ and C programming
Prior experience of x86/64 or arm assembly coding.
Solid research background in video codec.
Experienced in video coding standards such as VVC, AV1, HEVC, H.264/AVC, SVC, VPx.
Strong analytical and research skills.
Excellent written and verbal communication skills. Strong team player.
The candidate needs to be based in Singapore or willing to relocate to Singapore.

title: Research Engineer (Ionosphere, SAR imaging)
company_info: The National University of Singapore aspires to be a vital community of academics, researchers, staff, students and alumni working together in a spirit of innovation and enterprise for a better world. Our singular focus on talent will be the cornerstone of a truly great university that is dedicated to quality education, influential research and visionary enterprise, in service of country and society.
description:
Roles & Responsibilities
Interested applicants are invited to apply directly at the NUS Career Portal.
We regret that only shortlisted candidates will be notified.

Job Description
To investigate, through modeling and measurement, the impact of ionospheric effects on Synthetic Aperture Radar (SAR) satellite images.
Scope of work.
Sourcing and installation of equipment to measure ionospheric effects.
Working with SAR image providers on the tasking of SAR satellites and procurement of SAR images.
Preparing for field trials, including the design and installation of dedicated scatterers, such as corner reflectors.
Recording and processing of measured data.
Collaborate with researchers from SONDRA (CentraleSupelec ONERA NUS DSO Research Alliance), which may include research stints at SONDRA in France
Present the results at international conferences.
Qualifications
Possess at least a Bachelor degree in Electrical Engineering.
Has Hands-on experience with equipment, preferably with radio equipment, GNSS receivers, and software defined radio (SDR).
Experience with software tools such as MATLAB.
Positive attitude – Able to work independently and in a team.
Meticulous, able to work well with other researchers, and commitment to meeting deadlines
Open to fixed-term contract

company_info: Smile, you are wanted. Smiling is easy. Looking for the perfect job is... Well, leave that to Search Staffing Services. address: PAYA LEBAR SQUARE, 60 PAYA LEBAR ROAD 409051
description:
Roles & Responsibilities
Responsibilities:
Technical hands-on Activity for software & hardware
Apply failure analysis procedures to perform electrical circuit troubleshooting and identify the failure location and the root cause
Able utilise tests methodology such as SEM, EDX
Develop product test setups for laboratory testing
Compile and generate comprehensive Product Analysis Report
Initiate necessary activities for corrective action and closely working with various stakeholders to drive resolution
Develop reliability test plan, test setup and execute testing (on-going and accelerated reliability tests)
Design and generate ladder programming for reliability test
Procurement of required equipment, component and associated auxiliary materials for use in reliability test in a timely manner.
To facilitate external laboratory equipment and support testing schedule
Generate test report upon completion of testing
Liaison with stakeholders on anomaly observations.
Conduct troubleshooting of module or reliability setup if anomaly are observed
Requirements
Diploma/ Degree in Electronic and Electrical Engineering
Able to read and understand circuit schematics and layout
Experience in an electronic assembly environment
Experience to work with internal and external stakeholders
Familiar with test processes
Able to perform failure analysis with relevant equipment
Knowledge in analytical techniques such as bench verification, sample preparation for failure analysis
Background in semiconductor device knowledge, IC assembly or package would be a plus
Basic knowledge on working with SAP, JIRA environment and ladder programming would be a plus
Interested applicants, kindly send in a copy of your updated resume in WORD document, stating your current and expected remuneration together with notice period required to current employer.

title: Senior AMHS Engineer
company_info: Silicon Box Pte Ltd is a new startup venture, at the forefront of semiconductors integration, emerging from the new horizon of Chiplets integration trends in the semiconductor industry, driven by the needs of "dis-integration", benefits of faster time-to-market and lower cost of new device design. We provide services of semiconductor design of Chiplets at the leading edge of semiconductor device integration scheme with the next generation of advanced packaging manufacturing technologies.
description:
Roles & Responsibilities
Position Summary
Senior AMHS Engineer is responsible for providing technical support in the field of Automation. Implement actions for stable automation systems including activities related to maintenance, yield improvement, machine troubleshooting. Provide assistance in spare parts management, updating/revising of work-related SOP. Survey new solutions or replacement for existing Automation system.

Key Responsibilities
Carry out maintenance activities and schedule planning for all transportation equipment
Provide 24/7 support on Automation System trouble as and when needed.
To maintain and continuous improvement on automation systems.
Provide trainings and guidance to technician or AEs on automation system
Develops automation SOPs and job /recovery procedure
Assist in any other related duties assigned by immediate supervisor as and when necessary
Follow up on all outstanding works or improvements missions with vendors to ensure system stability
Liaise with team members, function teams or vendors on new projects about new automation requirement or system survey or any modifications improvement works.
Cooperating with other function teams on relevant works/missions.
Ensure all operation and maintenance works are carried out in safe manner.
Assist in spare parts management including procurement and safety stock.
Active participation in Total Productive Management (TPM) and collaboration with key stake holder from manufacturing.
Accountable for on-the-job safety and health of contractor or vendors under direct supervision.
Manage the Automation vendors and ensure that the requirement is delivered and maintained.
Perform, coordinate project execution, test commissioning, validation coordination for small or medium scale projects
Establish communication with MES for driving the process recipe and ensuring the related interfaces with automation systems are properly configured.
Drive the commissioning and qualification effort of production equipment with associated to Automation.
Involvement in capital projects involving facilities, utilities, equipment and system integration in Automation aspect.
Identifying equipment failures, root cause analysis and recommending solution to technical issues.

Requirement
Degree in Mechanical / Electrical Engineering or its equivalent
Preferably with at least 1 year of relevant experience in AMHS
Experience in Automated Manufacturing Environment will be an added advantage
Experience in coordination on machine setup and modification work
Familiar with Program Logic Control (PLC) Software and ACAD.
Knowledge in some programming language such as Java, Visual Basic, SQL and Tableau will be added advantage

description:
Roles & Responsibilities
Job Description:
Permanent
Jurong East
Up to $6500 + VB (avg 2 – 3 months)
Responsibilities:
Lead and drive the engineering design, implementation, integrated testing, and commissioning of ICT projects.
Responsible for ICT projects system installation and deployment, checkout, integration, testing and documentation to meet project milestone.
Setup of VM environment & hardening of the system OS including working with the respective OEMs ensure timely project delivery.
Coordinate with external and internal stakeholders to ensure timely project delivery.
Review the engineering tasks (includes Documentation of System Design, System Testing and Commissioning) and initiating the necessary corrective actions.
Establish system test methods and monitoring strategy to achieve success criteria.
Manage vendors to ensure timely and quality delivery to project.
Maintenance of on-premises hardware and system
Report to Project Manager on project technical progress
Requirements
Minimum Diploma in Computer Engineering, Electronics and Electrical Engineering or related discipline
At least 3 years’ experience in implementing ICT projects.
Knowledge in Public Security and Safety (PSS) or Enterprise domain, preliminary in ICT solutions
Knowledgeable in Windows/Linux hardening, security safety testing, and system configuration
Exposure to scripting knowledge, software knowledge will be added advantage.
Ability to work with multi-technology domains and multiple discipline projects.
Flexibility to learn new areas and able to implement multi-systems integrated solution.
Working experience in designing IT technical solutions for Tenders submission
Knowledge of virtualization software (VMWare, HyperV)
Good interpersonal, strong written and verbal communication skills including presentation experience to large and diverse audiences.
Strong organizational abilities to manage a technical team.
Industrious, self-motivated, independent, focus on results and execute instructions without much supervision & able to deliver jobs on time.
Willing to learn, result-oriented, good attitude.
Having the ability to manage and troubleshoot problems on Servers, Firewalls, Routers, Load Balancers and Switches
Strong knowledge in cloud computing, storage and virtualization
Solid understanding of network protocols, routing, and switching
Excellent problem-solving and troubleshooting skills.

company: THE SUPREME HR ADVISORY PTE. LTD.
company_info: THE SUPREME HR ADVISORY PTE. LTD. Here at The Supreme HR Advisory, we pride ourselves on being a vibrant recruitment firm with strong Southeast Asia standing. We believe in customizing our services to cater to your unique needs. We are dedicated, enthusiastic and we take innovative approaches in customizing our services. description:
Roles & Responsibilities
Audio Visual Project Engineer
Working days: Monday - Friday
Working hours: 9am - 6pm
Salary range: $2800 - $4000
Location: Kallang Bahru (Near Bendemeer MRT)

The Audio Visual Project Engineer will be responsible for overseeing the design, installation, and maintenance of audio visual systems for various projects. The Engineer will work closely with project managers, technicians, and clients to ensure that all audio visual systems are implemented to meet project requirements and specifications. The Engineer will also be responsible for testing and troubleshooting audio visual systems, as well as providing technical support to clients as needed.

Job Duties and Responsibilities:
Collaborate with project managers to determine project requirements and specifications for audio visual systems.
Design and develop audio visual system schematics, floor plans, and wiring diagrams.
Oversee installation of audio visual systems, including equipment placement, cabling, and integration with other systems.
Ensure that all audio visual systems meet industry standards and project requirements.
Test and troubleshoot audio visual systems to identify and resolve any issues.
Provide technical support to clients, including training on system operation and maintenance.
Create and maintain project documentation, including system manuals, as-built drawings, and testing reports.
Work with technicians to schedule and perform regular system maintenance, including firmware updates, software upgrades, and hardware replacements.
Stay up-to-date with industry trends, technologies, and best practices for audio visual system design and installation.
Brief project updates and status to project managers and clients as needed.
Qualifications:
Possess with Electrical Engineering, Audio Engineering, or related education background.
Experience in audio visual system design, installation, and maintenance.
Knowledge of audio visual system components, including video projectors, sound systems, video walls, and control systems.
Familiarity with audio visual system design software, such as AutoCAD or Visio.
Ability to read and interpret technical drawings and schematics.
Willingness to travel to project sites as needed.




WhatsApp: +65 9642 0989 (Han)
Email: supreme.cc.han@gmail.com
Chaw Chiaw Han, Reg No：R22106723
The Supreme HR Advisory Pte Ltd, EA No：14c7279

description:
Roles & Responsibilities
About SLB:
We are SLB, the leading provider of technology and services to the energy industry. Throughout much of the oil and gas lifecycle in over 120 countries; we design, develop and deliver technology and services that transforms how work is done. We define the boundaries of the industry by unleashing our talented people’s energy. We are looking for innovators to join our diverse community of colleagues and develop new solutions and push the limits of what is possible. If you share our passion for discovery and want to find out what you could really do, then here is the place to do it.

Manufacturing Engineer (Electrical/ Automation/ Project Management/ Troubleshooting)
Location: Benoi
Company Transport Provided (Boon Lay)
Salary from $4500 - $7000 depending on experience
AWS + VB

Job Summary:
Performs the lead role in the design and implementation of manufacturing processes, standards, and techniques.
Key interface between Engineering and Production and will typically be an expert in areas such as electrical and mechanical assemblies, test procedures, and process planning, to improve existing manufacturing processes.
Responsible for solving manufacturing or assembly problems and takes an active role in troubleshooting quality and production yield-related issues within manufacturing.

Responsibilities and Duties:
Responsible for the implementation of key elements of Lean & Six Sigma, such as standardized work instructions, work sequence (routing) optimization, Value Stream Mapping, Kaizen/5S activities, pull processes, etc.
Takes the lead in managing the deliverables of third parties by setting project timeframes, identifying problems, and assuring product quality.
Responsible for providing bi-weekly production order status and risks to the management team.
Creates, implements, and monitors key performance indicators for manufacturing process capability and product quality assurance.
Responsible for assisting in investigations, performing root cause analysis, and identifying corrective actions tied to manufacturing quality issues.
Review and sign off on Engineering Change Orders that impact the product life cycle, e.g., Obsolescence, etc.
Implement engineering specifications into processes and provide shop feedback to capture manufacturability and assembly issues for existing and future designs.
Responsible for identifying opportunities and driving continuous improvement projects on manufacturing processes to reduce waste, lead time, and cost.
Implement process improvements to achieve manufacturing excellence in areas like cycle time reduction, productivity, and process yield (e.g., First Pass Yield, Rolled Throughput Yield).

Requirements:
Bachelor's or Master's: Electrical, Electronics, Manufacturing, or Mechatronics Engineering.
Knowledge of the assembly and testing phases of the electrical and mechanical manufacturing lifecycle.
Knowledge of instrumentation and control systems is ideal
Knowledge of LEAN Six Sigma techniques and metrics.
Exposure and experience in Hazardous area installations (IEC 60079).

Apple Lim Pey Chyi – Apple.lim@manpower.com.sg
Personnel Reg No: R2090579
EA Licence No: 02C3423


SLB is an equal employment opportunity employer. Qualified applicants are CONSIDERED without regard to RACE, color, RELIGION, sex, sexual orientation, GENDER identity, national origin, AGE, disability, or other characteristics protected by law.

title: Machine Learning Engineer, Business Integrity
company_info: TikTok is the leading destination for short-form mobile video. Our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. TikTok has global offices including Los Angeles, New York, London, Paris, Berlin, Dubai, Singapore, Jakarta, Seoul and Tokyo. TikTok is committed to creating an inclusive space where employees are valued for their skills, experiences, and unique perspectives. Our platform connects people from across the globe and so does our workplace. At TikTok, our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. To achieve that goal, we are committed to celebrating our diverse voices and to creating an environment that reflects the many communities we reach. We are passionate about this and hope you are too.
description:
Roles & Responsibilities
TikTok is the leading destination for short-form mobile video. Our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. TikTok has global offices including Los Angeles, New York, London, Paris, Berlin, Dubai, Singapore, Jakarta, Seoul, and Tokyo.

Why Join Us
At TikTok, our people are humble, intelligent, compassionate and creative. We create to inspire - for you, for us, and for more than 1 billion users on our platform. We lead with curiosity and aim for the highest, never shying away from taking calculated risks and embracing ambiguity as it comes. Here, the opportunities are limitless for those who dare to pursue bold ideas that exist just beyond the boundary of possibility. Join us and make impact happen with a career at TikTok.

Our Business Integrity team has a strong user focus and a dedication to technical excellence. We aim to meet our users’ needs with reliable and high-performing platforms and services. We are looking for strong machine learning engineers who are excited to grow their business understanding, build highly scalable machine learning models, and partner across disciplines with global teams, in pursuit of excellence. Given the fast growth of TikTok in the world, we are working on building a next-generation content understanding system for TikTok monetization. We are seeking machine learning engineers at all levels experienced in machine learning, which can help us create an ecosystem that rewards high quality user experience and advertiser value.

Responsibilities:
1. Be responsible for content understanding of commercial products, such as ads, e-commerce, short video, and live streaming.
2. Be responsible for data mining, feature engineering, and building scalable machine learning models to establish monetization ecology.
3. Optimize computational efficiency and improve stability of machine learning models to deal with billion scale business data.
4. Based on business data, explore and implement various cutting-edge technologies, such as pre-training, self-supervised learning, few-shot learning, etc.
5. Explore state-of-the-art AIGC techniques and build a new generation of AIGC-based monetization ecology systems.

Qualifications
1. Bachelor's degree or above, majoring in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Electrical Engineering, or other related fields.
2. Have a solid foundation with common machine learning related techniques and algorithms (e.g. classification, clustering, regression, etc.). Be proficient with at least one deep learning framework (e.g. PyTorch,TensorFlow).
3. Related experience in at least one of the following areas
- Be familiar with computer vision related tasks. Have rich experience in at least one aspect, such as image/video classification, object detection, image/video retrieval, OCR, image segmentation, etc.
- Be familiar with NLP-related tasks. Have experience in at least one aspect, such as text classification, semantic analysis, sentiment analysis, NER, etc.
- Be familiar with audio-related tasks. Have experience in at least one aspect, such as ASR, AED, LID, etc.
- Be familiar with multimodal machine learning, large-scale multimodal pre-training, etc.
- Be familiar with the theory and application of graph networks, knowledge graphs, and have relevant experience.
- Be familiar with model acceleration techniques such as pruning, quantization, distillation, etc.; Have relevant experience in deploying models using frameworks such as TensorRT.
4. Solid programming foundation. Be familiar with basic data structures and algorithms.
5. Have excellent analytical and problem-solving skills, logical thinking skills, communication and collaboration skills. Maintain curiosity about new things, and have a strong sense of responsibility, integrity and reliability.
6. Having published papers in top AI conferences or journals (CVPR, ICCV, ECCV, TPAMI, IJCV, ICML, NeurIPS, ICLR, ACL, EMNLP, NAACL, etc.) is a plus.
7. Being familiar with generative models is a plus, such as GPT, Stable Diffusion, etc.

TikTok is committed to creating an inclusive space where employees are valued for their skills, experiences, and unique perspectives. Our platform connects people from across the globe and so does our workplace. At TikTok, our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. To achieve that goal, we are committed to celebrating our diverse voices and to creating an environment that reflects the many communities we reach. We are passionate about this and hope you are too.

description:
Roles & Responsibilities
TikTok will be prioritizing applicants who have a current right to work in Singapore, and do not require TikTok's sponsorship of a visa.

TikTok is the leading destination for short-form mobile video. Our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. TikTok has global offices including Los Angeles, New York, London, Paris, Berlin, Dubai, Singapore, Jakarta, Seoul and Tokyo.

Why Join Us
Creation is the core of TikTok's purpose. Our platform is built to help imaginations thrive. This is doubly true of the teams that make TikTok possible.
Together, we inspire creativity and bring joy - a mission we all believe in and aim towards achieving every day.
To us, every challenge, no matter how difficult, is an opportunity; to learn, to innovate, and to grow as one team. Status quo? Never. Courage? Always.
At TikTok, we create together and grow together. That's how we drive impact - for ourselves, our company, and the communities we serve.
Join us.

About the Team
The Recommendation Architecture team is responsible for building up and optimizing our recommendation system's architecture to provide the most stable and best experience for our users.

We are looking for talented individuals to join us in 2024. As a graduate, you will get unparalleled opportunities for you to kickstart your career, pursue bold ideas and explore limitless growth opportunities. Co-create a future driven by your inspiration with TikTok.

Candidates can apply to a maximum of two positions and will be considered for jobs in the order you apply. The application limit is applicable to TikTok and its affiliates' jobs globally. Applications will be reviewed on a rolling basis - we encourage you to apply early.

Responsibilities
- Architect and develop efficient, highly scalable and secured services;
- Optimise backend systems and services for data security, modularity, computational efficiency and scalability;
- Analyse business and technical requirements carefully to solve challenging problems
- Participate in design reviews and code reviews
- Collaborate with fellow engineers, product managers, and business owners in the team to ensure timely delivery of business requirements
- Research, design, and develop computer and network software or specialised utility programs
- Analyse user needs and develop software solutions, applying principles and techniques of computer science, engineering, and mathematical analysis
- Update software, enhances existing software capabilities, and develops and direct software testing and validation procedures
- Work with computer hardware engineers to integrate hardware and software systems and develop specifications and performance requirements

Qualifications
- Final year or recent graduate with a background in Software Development, Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Electrical Engineering or a related technical discipline.
- Strong software programming capabilities, exhibits good code design and coding style;
- Familiarity with at least one of the programming languages: Go, Python, Java or C++;
- Pragmatic understanding of data structure, algorithm design and analysis, networking, data security, distributed system, and highly scalable systems design.

Preferred Qualifications
- Agile, quick self learner, highly self-motivated with strong sense of product ownership and creative problem solver.
- Deeply passionate about software coding/development and building great mobile/web applications.
- Good collaborator and team player, comfortable working in a fast moving, culturally diverse and globally distributed team environment.

TikTok is committed to creating an inclusive space where employees are valued for their skills, experiences, and unique perspectives. Our platform connects people from across the globe and so does our workplace. At TikTok, our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. To achieve that goal, we are committed to celebrating our diverse voices and to creating an environment that reflects the many communities we reach. We are passionate about this and hope you are too.

By submitting an application for this role, you accept and agree to our global applicant privacy policy, which may be accessed here: https://careers.tiktok.com/legal/privacy.

If you have any questions, please reach out to us at apac-earlycareers@tiktok.com.

TikTok is the leading destination for short-form mobile video. Our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. TikTok has global offices including Los Angeles, New York, London, Paris, Berlin, Dubai, Singapore, Jakarta, Seoul and Tokyo.

Why Join Us
Creation is the core of TikTok's purpose. Our platform is built to help imaginations thrive. This is doubly true of the teams that make TikTok possible.
Together, we inspire creativity and bring joy - a mission we all believe in and aim towards achieving every day.
To us, every challenge, no matter how difficult, is an opportunity; to learn, to innovate, and to grow as one team. Status quo? Never. Courage? Always.
At TikTok, we create together and grow together. That's how we drive impact - for ourselves, our company, and the communities we serve.
Join us.

About the Team
E-commerce is a new and fast growing business that aims at connecting all customers to excellent sellers and quality products on TikTok Shop, through E-commerce live-streaming, E-commerce short videos, and commodity recommendation. Our E-ecommerce Recommendation Infra team is responsible for building up and optimizing the infrastructure for such recommendation systems, so as to provide the most stable and best experience for our users. We work closely with applied machine learning engineers and build scalable systems to support all kinds of innovative algorithms and techniques.

We are looking for talented individuals to join us in 2024. As a graduate, you will get unparalleled opportunities for you to kickstart your career, pursue bold ideas and explore limitless growth opportunities. Co-create a future driven by your inspiration with TikTok.

Candidates can apply to a maximum of two positions and will be considered for jobs in the order you apply. The application limit is applicable to TikTok and its affiliates' jobs globally. Applications will be reviewed on a rolling basis - we encourage you to apply early.

Responsibilities
- Build and maintain high performance online services for TikTok recommendation system；
- Build extremely efficient and reliable data pipelines for candidates generation, profile generation, training examples generation, realtime online training, etc;
- Build globalized large-scale recommendation system;
- Design and develop high performance computing frameworks and storage systems.
- Research, design, and develop computer and network software or specialised utility programs.
- Analyse user needs and develop software solutions, applying principles and techniques of computer science, engineering, and mathematical analysis.
- Update software, enhances existing software capabilities, and develops and direct software testing and validation procedures.
- Work with computer hardware engineers to integrate hardware and software systems and develop specifications and performance requirements.

Qualifications
- Final year or recent graduate with a background in Software Development, Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Electrical Engineering or a related technical discipline.
- Experience programming in at least one of the following programming languages: C, C++, Java or Golang;
- Effective communication skills and a sense of ownership and drive;
- Experienced in at least one area of the following areas: personalized recommendations, search engine, machine learning, distributed storage system, big data frameworks is a plus.

Preferred Qualifications
- Experience in e-commerce related areas

TikTok is committed to creating an inclusive space where employees are valued for their skills, experiences, and unique perspectives. Our platform connects people from across the globe and so does our workplace. At TikTok, our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. To achieve that goal, we are committed to celebrating our diverse voices and to creating an environment that reflects the many communities we reach. We are passionate about this and hope you are too.

About the Team
Our Recommendation Architecture Team is responsible for building up and optimizing the architecture for our recommendation system to provide the most stable and best experience for our TikTok users. The team is responsible for system stability and high availability, online services and offline data flow performance optimization, solving system bottlenecks, reducing cost overhead, building data and service mid-platform, realizing flexible and scalable high-performance storage and computing systems.

We are looking for talented individuals to join us in 2024. As a graduate, you will get unparalleled opportunities for you to kickstart your career, pursue bold ideas and explore limitless growth opportunities. Co-create a future driven by your inspiration with TikTok.

Candidates can apply to a maximum of two positions and will be considered for jobs in the order you apply. The application limit is applicable to TikTok and its affiliates' jobs globally. Applications will be reviewed on a rolling basis - we encourage you to apply early.

Responsibilities
- Design and implement a reasonable offline data architecture for large-scale recommendation systems
- Design and implement flexible, scalable, stable and high-performance storage and computing systems
- Trouble-shooting of the production system, design and implement the necessary mechanisms and tools to ensure the stability of the overall operation of the production system
- Build industry-leading distributed systems such as storage and computing to provide reliable infrastructure for massive data and large-scale business systems
- Develop and implement techniques and analytics applications to transform raw data into meaningful information using data-oriented programming languages and visualisation software
- Apply data mining, data modelling, natural language processing, and machine learning to extract and analyse information from large structured and unstructured datasets
- Visualise, interpret, and report data findings and may create dynamic data reports as well

Qualifications
- Final year or recent graduate with a background in Software Development, Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Electrical Engineering or a related technical discipline.
- Familiar with many open source frameworks in the field of big data, e.g.Hadoop, Hive,Flink, FlinkSQL,Spark, Kafka, HBase, Redis, RocksDB, ElasticSearch etc.
- Familiar with Java, C ++ and other programming languages
- Strong coding and trouble shooting ability

Our Recommendation Architecture Team is responsible for building up and optimizing the architecture for our recommendation system to provide the most stable and best experience for our TikTok users.

This person will be responsible for the design and development of the live broadcast recommendation system architecture, ensuring system stability and high availability; responsible for online services, offline data flow performance optimization, solving performance bottlenecks, reducing costs and unlocking; common components and services of the postal image system, building recommendation platforms, and supporting new Factory incubation.

- Focus on Architecture abstraction and process optimization for recommendation scenarios, support large-scale machine learning optimization
- Focus on large-scale systems with high concurrency and high throughput, improve system stability, performance, and scalability
- Research and development and optimization of core components, application and implementation of new technologies
- Research, design, and develop computer and network software or specialised utility programs
- Analyse user needs and develop software solutions, applying principles and techniques of computer science, engineering, and mathematical analysis
- Update software, enhances existing software capabilities, and develops and direct software testing and validation procedures
- Work with computer hardware engineers to integrate hardware and software systems and develop specifications and performance requirements

title: Electrical Engineer
company_info: ENGGSOL PTE. LTD.
description:
Roles & Responsibilities
As an Electrical Engineer / Senior Electrical Engineer, you will be part of a team that is responsible for designing, developing, integrating, and testing of electrical and electronic components for unmanned naval systems of systems.
You will work closely with multiple teams and vendors to ensure the interoperability, compatibility, and functionality of multiple subsystems.
Key Responsibilities:
Design, implement, integrate, and test electrical systems for complex systems of systems, including selection of components, power distribution, and wiring.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams of engineers and stakeholders to ensure that electrical systems meet design requirements.
Develop and maintain electrical system specifications, design documents, and other technical documentation.
Conduct analyses, simulations, and tests to evaluate electrical systems' performance and identify issues.
Identify, analyse, and resolve design issues and technical problems related to electrical systems.
Participate in design reviews and provide technical guidance and support to other team members.
Ensure that electrical systems comply with industry standards and regulations, including safety standards.
Support manufacturing and installation teams during system deployment and testing phases, including hands-on installation and cable termination works.
Requirements
Degree in Electrical Engineering or related field.
Strong knowledge of electrical engineering principles and practices.
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
Ability to work effectively in a team environment.
Willingness to travel as needed.

title: Electrical Engineer
company_info: System Technic Engineering Pte. Ltd. is an SME specialising in maintenance, servicing and testing of power cables, 22kV switchgears, transformers and low voltage switchboards in the Distribution network system. We have been in the industry for 30 years. Our in-house expertise comprises authorised High Voltage Testing Engineers, licensed electrical workers (engineers and technician grades), all authorised to carry out testing and commissioning of electrical installations up to 22kV, including powergrid installations. Our clients include high rise offices, shopping centres, army camps, airbases, schools, grade “A” offices, hotels, condominiums, government institutions and hospitals.
description:
Roles & Responsibilities
Roles and Responsibilities:

The job content is wide and varied with countless opportunities for hands-on work and management:
• Carry out servicing, testing and maintenance of high tension switchgear, transformers, low voltage switchboards and cables in Distribution network
• Plan and schedule site jobs
• Ensure that administrative requirements of clients are met e.g. Submission of name lists for clearance.
• Supervise and guide juniors to ensure works are completed as per plan and schedule, meeting quality & safety objectives.
• Manage and coordinate with clients on schedules, the scope of works, on-site issues, technical issue, when the needs arise.
• Manage Company's Engineering and maintenance projects as assigned by Directors.
• Prepare method statements, Work Instructions and other infrastructure documentation.
• Timely completion of site work or project documentation such as service report, test report, post service report
• Ensure compliance with Bizsafe regulation, Safe Work Procedures and ISO Quality Standards related to the execution of assigned works
• Assist in company innovation projects such as Mobile Form and Inventory Solution
• Respond to and investigate all incidents and non-compliance issues and complete all appropriate paperwork and reporting
• Other ad-hoc duties as assigned by the management.

Career Progression Plan:
The experience gained on the job will put you well ahead of the pact in your running for professional recognition with the PE Board, EMA and Singapore Power:
• First Goal: Attainment of a PE Certificate
• Second Goal: Attainment of a LEW, grade 9 Licence (22 kV) allowing you to practise in the consumer market
• Third Goal: Attainment of an SP Powergrid Authorised High Voltage Testing Engineer Licence allowing you to carry out Switchgear Testing Works in SP Powergrid sub-stations
• Long term Goal: There are many opportunities for you to climb the career ladder to lead and manage the company's operations and business.

Job Requirements
- Possess Bachelor Degree in Electrical Engineering preferably in Power. Those with Diploma in Electrical Engineering are welcome to apply and will be considered for Technical Officer position.
- Good communication, interpersonal and time management skills.
- Possess strong leadership quality, team work, good planning and organizing ability.
- Takes initiative for personal and professional development.
- Willing to work on weekends, public holidays, overnight and during odd hours due to the nature of business.

title: Marine Electrical Engineer
company_info: Vitol is an energy and commodities company; its primary business is the trading and distribution of energy products globally – it trades over seven million barrels per day of crude oil and products and, at any time, has 250 ships transporting its cargoes. Vitol’s clients include national oil companies, multinationals, leading industrial and chemical companies and the world’s largest airlines. Founded in Rotterdam in 1966, today Vitol serves clients from some 40 offices worldwide and is invested in energy assets globally including: circa 18mm3 of storage across seven continents, 480kbpd of refining capacity and 5,000 service stations across Africa, Australia, Eurasia and in Northwest Europe. Revenues in 2018 were in excess of $200bn. For more information: www.vitol.com VBunkers is a 100% subsidiary of the Vitol Group, an expert bunker tanker manager and operator with extensive experience of physical bunker supplies in the port of Singapore, the world’s largest bunkering port, and a fleet of 15 modern Singapore flagged bunker tankers, including Singapore’s first and currently only Liquefied Natural Gas (LNG) powered dual fuel bunker tanker “Marine Vicky”.
job_category: Engineering, Repair and Maintenance, Risk Management
description:
Roles & Responsibilities
The Electrical Engineer performs activities related to the electrical works and maintenance needed onboard the Company’s fleet of vessels. This includes and is not limited to:
Attend & assist the Fleet vessels with day-to-day maintenance management of electrical/electronic/electro-hydraulic or electro-pneumatic/ automation systems.
Reviewing the fleet planned maintenance schedule of electrical/electronic/electro-hydraulic or electro-pneumatic/ automation systems / power generation / backup power source / fire detection system and submit to technical manager.
Assist to guide onboard engineers on the task which require electrical engineers’ competencies so that they could operate and maintain electrical/electronic/electro-hydraulic/electro-pneumatic/automation systems efficiently.
Attend & assist fleet vessels to manage electrical / electronic / electro-hydraulic/electro-pneumatic/ automation equipment failures and carry out fault diagnosis with the aim to resolve the issue.
Advise the Technical Superintendent for the need of shore assistance or need to procure spares in case defects of equipment failures which cannot be resolved thru onboard attendance.
Carry out on board attendance in liaison with the Technical Superintendents.
Provide work done report and submit to technical manager on the fleet vessels attended.
Carry out Annual IR Test of electrical Motors & Generators of Fleet vessels.
Carry out annual calibration of Cargo tanks Temperature and Pressure sensors, manifold pressure gauges of fleet vessels.
Carry out annual calibration of Fixed Gas detectors.
Provide support to Project team by reviewing Electrical drawings of new build vessels.
Identify areas for improvements and modifications on electro/automation system and make methodical recommendations for efficient operation of the vessel.
Advise Technical Superintendent for matters related to defects input & electrical repair specification for dry docking planning.
Assist to provide input to Technical Superintendent for incident investigations on electrical matters.
Actively participate and engage in the process for the continuous improvement of departmental procedures.
Job Requirements
Diploma in Electrical Engineering
Preferred 5 years of relevant work experience in Marine Electrical Industry.
Added advantage with experience of working onboard sea going vessels as ETO (Electrical-Technical Officers) for a minimum period of 2 years.
Possess good knowledge of electrical power distribution, maintenance, and practical hands-on skills.
Proficient in troubleshooting & fault diagnosis skills related to electrical, instrumentation, automation & control and including air conditioning and ventilation system.
Able to read and understand Engineering Drawings (Electrical and pneumatic)
Familiar with regulatory and legislative shipping industry environment.
A team player and collaborate well with office technical team as well as shipboard team.
Able to communicate well and Fluency in English in both written and spoken.

title: Assistant Electrical Engineer (Changi)
company_info: We provide innovative solutions in turnkey building, repair and conversion services for naval and commercial vessels and are one of the few shipyards in the world capable of supporting the entire lifecycle of a ship. Our shipyards in Singapore and the U.S. have established a strong track record in designing and building highly customised and technically sophisticated commercial and military vessels for customers worldwide. Expanding on our core competencies in large scale engineering, we provide a comprehensive suite of environmental engineering solutions in water, wastewater, solid waste and renewable energy. A trusted partner to naval and commercial sector customers worldwide, our track record includes successfully delivered projects in Brunei, China, India, Thailand, Singapore, the Middle East and the U.S.
description:
Roles & Responsibilities
Responsibilities:
Supervise/perform fault diagnosis, trouble shooting and maintenance of power system/component in workshops and onboard vessels
Liaise with various departments within company and client to expedite the scope of work
Lead a team of electricians in corrective and preventive maintenance
Prepare work completion reports for Customer’s Acceptance.
Perform maintenance works in accordance with vessel safety requirement
Conduct in-depth troubleshooting of electrical connections and Programmable Logic Controllers (PLC) programs.
Coordinate with vendors and partners, conduct design reviews with customers, and maintain documentation according to our ISO quality systems.
Requirements:
Diploma in Electrical Engineering
2-5 years of relevant experience in the Marine related or Oil & Gas industry
Candidate with no experience may apply
Experienced dealing with 440V Main switchboard, Distribution Boards, Transformer, Power Generator, Main Engine, Converter, Inverter Batteries, Fire alarm & flooding system and Ship Control Monitoring & Management System
Experience in troubleshooting on various brands of PLCs (Panasonic, Omron, Allen Bradley, Siemens, Mitsubishi, ABB, etc.) is advantageous
Proficient in selection and integration of sensors, pneumatic systems, Stepper and Servo Motors & control systems, Power Supply Units, other electrical hard wares, etc.
Possess man management experience in leading up to 6 men, including Supervisors and Technicians
Willing to work as a team player to achieve assigned task within given timeline.
Comfortable with report writing
Able to work onboard vessels and at heights

description:
Roles & Responsibilities
Our client is from Oil and Gas industry. They are looking for a Analyser Engineer to assist their team for the next phase of their business. They are located in West.
Duties:
Conduct maintenance activities for process stream analyzers, ensuring seamless on-stream operations.
Collaborate on continuous improvement projects to address and rectify issues affecting the accuracy and functionality of analyzers.
Develop, revise, and maintain comprehensive standard operating procedures (SOPs) for process stream analyzers and laboratory equipment.
Oversight and management of laboratory operations in collaboration with a reputable service provider.

Efficiently respond to customers' inquiries related to measurement and quality management.

Familiarity with standard operating procedures (SOPs) and laboratory protocols.

description:
Roles & Responsibilities
This position will be based in Singapore to use their specialized knowledge to maintain an efficient procurement system to supply cost effective materials and services to support the company’s operations.

Job Responsibilities
• Support the procurement function and other relevant departments and communicate any supply problems which may impact on business operations. Act as an interface between suppliers and relevant departments on purchasing processes and new projects and activities.
• Maintain system integrity of supplier’s info in the ERP system, such as items suppliers connect, purchasing agreements and supplier basic data like MOQ, order multiple, purchasers responsible and supplier maintenance.
• Conduct business review meetings with key stakeholders to assess risk, review future strategies, and identify potential cost down, new programs and improvement opportunities or mitigate the risk.
• Create and review opportunities on alternative materials and or suppliers to meet the business unit objectives in procurement activities and deliver best values and business savings.
• Collaborating with our technology to understand our company needs as well as work with our existing/new suppliers to determine company strategic alignment.
• Understand the trend of raw material / feedstock related, update the information to commercial team, provide analysis on costs, new and cost savings activities. Develop strong partnership with suppliers.
• Monitor market trends, competitor strategies and market suppliers, provide analysis on costs, new and existing and review cost to achieve savings. Establish r/s with suppliers to leverage the needs in term on tight supply situation as well as to be ahead of the market requirement.
• Contribute and communicate the impact on Procurement activities to new business initiatives and projects. Involve in Global procurement project activities.
• Assess and evaluate supplier’s performance reviews, compiling data relating to supplier performance to enable evaluation.
• To audit supplier supply capability and quality standard when required. Maintain proper documentation in accordance with ISO procedures.


Job Requirements:
• Degree in Mechanical / Electrical Engineering / Material Science or other relevant discipline
• At least 3 year(s) of working experience in the related field

Specific Knowledge
• Possess very strong sourcing skills.
• Accountable team worker, proactive, problem solving and analytical abilities.
• Excellent communication skills with all levels of organization and suppliers.
• Strong interpersonal skills to work productively and collaboratively with multi-functional teams to achieve business goals.
• Candidates with good raw material commodity price trend analysis will be at advantage

Language
• Fluent in English for handling English speaking people

description:
Roles & Responsibilities
Audio Visual Service Engineer
Working days: Monday - Friday
Working hours: 9am - 6pm
Salary range: $2800 - $4000
Location: Kallang Bahru (Near Bendemeer MRT)

The Audio Visual Service Engineer will be responsible for providing technical support for audio visual equipment in a variety of settings, including corporate offices, educational institutions, government agencies, and public venues. Candidate will work with clients to troubleshoot and resolve technical issues related to audio visual equipment, including projectors, video walls, digital signage, and video conferencing systems. The role will require extensive knowledge of audio visual equipment, as well as excellent communication and customer service skills.

Key Responsibilities:
Install, configure, and troubleshoot audio visual equipment such as projectors, video walls, digital signage, and video conferencing systems.
Work with clients to diagnose and resolve technical issues related to audio visual equipment.
Provide on-site technical support for events and presentations, including set-up and breakdown of equipment.
Train clients on the proper use and maintenance of audio visual equipment.
Maintain an inventory of audio visual equipment and ensure that all equipment is in good working condition.
Perform preventive maintenance on audio visual equipment to minimize downtime and extend the life of the equipment.
Stay up-to-date on new audio visual technologies and products and recommend upgrades or improvements to existing systems.
Provide excellent customer service and maintain positive relationships with clients.
Qualifications:
Possess with electrical engineering, computer science, or related education background.
Experience in audio visual engineering or a related field.
Extensive knowledge of audio visual equipment, including projectors, video walls, digital signage, and video conferencing systems.
Experience with troubleshooting technical issues related to audio visual equipment.
Willingness to work flexible hours and be available for on-call support.
Knowledge of networking and IT infrastructure is a plus.
Lee Wan Ling | Reg No: R23116154
